        public boolean isValid()
        Description copied from class: TriggerInfo
        Check whether this TriggerInfo is valid or not so that it may can be used to instantiate the Trigger instance.
        Specified by:
        isValid in class TriggerInfo
        Returns:
        true if valid; false if not (will be skipped for loading)

      • toConventionalName

        public static String toConventionalName(File folder,
                                        File sourceCodeFile)
        get name which includes the path. For example, if the triggerName of this NamedTrigger is `abc` and it's in the folder `../NamedTrigger/some/folder/`, then the result will be `some:folder:abc`
        Returns:
        the named to be used for NamedTrigger convention
